name: Paper Street
description:
Paper Street : A timed adventure

Players control a  mysterious grumpy guy named Idle.

The game takes place in a house of Paper Street, the player will have to complete several tasks in a given time before he can escape !!

Will you be brave enough to discover  the secret that lie in this house ?


° Timed game

° Pixel Art

° Frame by Frame animations

° Gamepad or Keyboard
